Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Description: Ingress from other containers in the same security group

ImageUrl.Description: The url of a docker image that contains the application process that will handle the traffic for this service

ContainerPort.Description: What port number the application inside the docker container is binding to

ContainerCpu.Description: How much CPU to give the container. 1024 is 1 CPU

ContainerMemory.Description: How much memory in megabytes to give the container

Path.Description: A path on the public load balancer that this service should be connected to. Use * to send all load balancer traffic to this service.

Priority.Description: The priority for the routing rule added to the load balancer. This only applies if your have multiple services which have been assigned to different paths on the load balancer.

DesiredCount.Description: How many copies of the service task to run

Role.Description: (Optional) An IAM role to give the service's containers if the code within needs to access other AWS resources like S3 buckets, DynamoDB tables, etc
